name: 莊欣慈
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week(s)	Academic Connections 3
1	Orientation
2	Unit 7 – Biology: Genetic Testing [Reading]
3	Unit 7 – [Reading] / [Listening]
4	Unit 7 – [Writing]
5	Reading / Listening Practices
6	Listening / Writing Practices
7	Review
8	Presentations
9	Midterm Examination
10	Unit 8 – Business: Mediation [Reading]
11	Unit 8 – [Reading] / [Listening]
12	Unit 8 – [Writing]
13	Reading / Listening Practices
14	Listening / Writing Practices
15	Review
16 - 17	Presentations
18	Final Examination
scorePolicy:
上課出席 (如:上課活動、小組討論、筆記寫作、報告表現等) 50%
回家作業 (如:作文寫作、閱讀預習、小組共同作業等) 20%
期中全校英文會考成績 15%
期末全校英文會考成績 15%
materials: ��	Academic Connections 3. Julia Williams and David Hill. (2010) (Pearson Education)
